name: Dragon Pop - Bubble Shooter
description:
WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST BUBBLE SHOOTER ADVENTURE!

Dragon Pop is a classic and most playful bubble shooter game. Match and pop colorful bubbles and rescue all cute dragons trapped by bubbles over 1000 captivating levels.

Main Features:
●Super easy to pick up and play, but challenging to master!
●Play over 1000 bubble blasting levels.
●Drag your finger to move the target, aim and shoot!
● Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!
●Shoot bubble to clear the same color bubbles to complete the puzzle level.
●Beautiful graphics and animations. Everything is bursting with color.
●Outstanding and cheerful background music.
●With different and addictive levels, your will get more and more interested.
●Complete daily task and get tons of free coins.

Download it now and enjoy hours of fun with this classic Bubble Shooter game every day!

Dragon Pop is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's "Restrictions" menu.

Questions? Contact our Tech Support by clicking the button "Contact US" in game, or visit:
